resources.string: Full or part sun, average water. Blooms spring through fall. 10-14" tall, space 6-8" apart.
Because this Ice Plant is categorized as an annual flowering plant, it will grow quickly, bloom profusely and later die with the first killing frost.

Outsidepride is a family owned U.S. Company. No other company on this listing is selling our seed. USDA Zones: 3 - 10. Height: 20 - 24 inch annual. Bloom Color: Mix. Sowing Rate: 2 - 4 seeds per plant or approximately 9 lbs per acre.
BLOOM TIME: Late Summer HARDINESS ZONE: 4 - 8 PLANT HEIGHT: 72 - 96". PLANT SPACING: 24 - 36". LIGHT REQUIREMENTS: Sun - Shade. SOIL / WATER: Average. Attracts bees, butterflies, and birds.
seedling plant seeds on a moist cotton or other media, then after germinate immediately move to the ground
